column2: Fed Chairman Jerome Powell this week said he could see a "soft landing" for the U.S. economy despite interest rate hikes. The chairman of Icahn Enteprises, Carl Icahn, disagrees.
column4: Soft landing? Activist investor Carl Icahn sees ‘recession or even worse’ ahead for the U.S.

column2: EV stocks have multiplied in Tesla’s wake and as electric cars look to go mainstream. Here are the top-rated electric vehicle makers.
column4: These Are The 5 Best EV Stocks To Buy And Watch Now

column2: GameStop shares jump Tuesday on heaviest volume since August 2021, after a Reddit post argues the stock is trading at a massive discount, and the other memes followed along.
column4: GameStop shares soar 30% and take other meme stocks on a ride, after Reddit poster touts shares at a ‘58.2%’ discount

column2: The currency Ether seems to be rising on signs of progress in a major upgrade of the Ethereum blockchain network. Exchanges like Coinbase could benefit.
column4: Ether’s Big Network Upgrade May Be Coming. Why the Token Is Trouncing Bitcoin.
